# GitHub Repository Topics

This file documents the recommended topics for the GitHub repository About section.

## Repository Description

```
React Native Bluetooth (BLE) - Peripheral & Central
```

## Topics

The following topics should be added to the repository:

- react
- react-native
- bluetooth
- ble
- bluetooth-low-energy
- ble-peripherals
- peripheral
- ble-peripheral
- bluetooth-peripheral
- central
- ble-central
- gatt
- react-native-bluetooth
- munim-bluetooth
- nitro-modules
- expo
- typescript
- ios
- android

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to the repository on GitHub
2. Click the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About"
3. Add the description in the "Description" field
4. Add each topic in the "Topics" field (comma-separated or press Enter after each)
